oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Letter to Margaret Croft from Berea College Industries
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Letter written to Margaret Croft by Irene Blanton from Berea College Industries in Kentucky. Blanton writes that they do not have any looms in stock due to reduced production during the war. She states that they do not expect to have any available soon, even if "the end of the war is only a matter of hours," since it will take time to resume production.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Blanton, Irene
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Weaving; Handicraft; Correspondence; Stores, Retail--Tennessee; Craft shops
